articles.title: Biden chooses Lisa Franchetti to head military branch - BBC
articles.description: Admiral Lisa Franchetti will become the first woman to lead a Pentagon military branch if confirmed.
articles.content:
US President Biden has chosen a female admiral to lead the US Navy - the first time a woman has been nominated to head a Pentagon military service branch.

articles.title: Huge asteroid flew closer to Earth than the MOON earlier this month - Daily Mail
articles.description: An asteroid called 2023 NT1 reached around 62,000 miles from Earth - about a quarter the distance between Earth and the moon - on July 13. Here's why it went by unnoticed.
articles.content:
NASA usually has a reassuringly close eye on asteroids that come anywhere near our planet, but one has managed to slip through the net.
